comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content:
Typing error, the correct name is Monro, as written on the picture.

"General Sir Charles Carmichael Monro, 1st Baronet of Bearcrofts, GCB, GCSI, GCMG, (15 June 1860 – 7 December 1929) was a British Army General during World War I and Governor of Gibraltar from 1923 to 1929."

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: B-59 you are correct.  We will fix the typo and thanks for the additional information.
